messages.message: Off the phone with MUFG today and they have been testing multi file processing and this was working well for them. They also said the design of this box was an improvement, but used up a lot of credits because its now really hard to see which model you are currently using. Its easy to leave it on Advanced for ages and use up a lot of credits. Can we make the model you are currently using more obvious? Even if this is highlighted somewhere in the conversation history?

@Lee It's captured in 2 places:
1. When the switch happens first time, it displays in the conversation history
2. The tool-tip for the model selection button shows the current model
And I completely agree the conv history can get lengthy and  it's not visible any more. And tool tip is not very obvious. We will address this.
cc: @Varun Jain @tj.serkes @Aayush
think we should just display the model name like before, since there's still a good amount of blank space in the bottom / model name won't take up too much space anyways
Agreed, we will pick this up in the next release.
